name: Top Hunter: Roddy & Cathy
overview: The age of space colonialism... The dreaded Klaptons are on the loose, turning peaceful settlements into deserted ghost towns. Searching for the price on the Klapton's heads come the cosmic bounty hunters RODDY & CATHY. Do these two have what it takes to save the universe? Their fate, and the fate of the free universe is in your hands! The legendary team known as "Top Hunter".
